page.title: 13Watford: Religion 1
page.content:
Over the last 10 to 15 years the religious complexion of Watford has changed.
Christianity is still the predominant overt religion, although there is an apparent trend away from church based worship, towards House Groups.
Catholicism and Anglicanism are still the major groups with non-comformist and Quaker meeting houses following.
Watford is also the national centre for the Seventh Day Adventists.
Some christian churches are moving into cross-religious discussion and help, to the extent of offering church halls as multi-cultural centres.
